Title: Requires the establishment of carbon capture projects
Summary: Requires the establishment of carbon capture projects in order to achieve the greenhouse gas emissions reduction goals of the climate leadership and community protection act.
LawCode: Add ยง66-x, Pub Serv L; amd ยง224-d, Lab L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law and the labor law, in relation to requiring the establishment of carbon capture projects
